content.description: The quick access allows you to open a quick access bar with the shortcut [Ctrl + K] with which you can search for various functions of the Peakboard Designer and execute them directly from the bar.
Have you ever had a PC crash while working with Peakboard Designer? We are here for you! With the Autosave feature, you can restore your project after a crash so you don't lose your hard work.
